articles.author: Donny Kwok, Jessie Pang
articles.description: Blackened skies unleashed torrential rains on Hong Kong and the high-tech cities surrounding south China's Pearl River Delta on Tuesday, shutting hospitals, schools and law courts, and turning the Asian financial centre's many staircases into waterfalls.
articles.title: Hong Kong issues highest weather warning, as rains shut schools, courts and hospital wards
